User said it didn’t take much effort going back and forth between video and messages other than occasional unpausing of the video.
User doesn’t believe that meta Ai provides accurate answers to questions. Ai answer gave a very unspecific and wide range to a question then provided resources to look up the answer.

Meta stopped responding to “hey meta”
User wishes Meta Ai could give higher level answers and could expand on and give more detail to answers.

User got meta ai to give more detail on an answer, user believes it’s due to timing of asking. If user asks while interrupting Meta, it shuts down. If user waits until meta ai is done talking, gives it a second then asks it to expand on an answer, meta Ai can.

Users feels they have become more “fluent” in managing the gesture controls to navigate the MR displays.
